name: no life
description: no life is a game about mumei and alex. mumei is sharp and witted while alex is more sentimental and bleak. they both play a role in the player's life. spoiler but there are two separate endings. either are fine they're almost identical. most of the game was rotoscoped and or blatantly traced. all my time mostly went into the animation and music. it was fun. i hope you enjoy.
